tool_description: This API ensures Major League Baseball (MLB) fans stay informed with the latest data on scores, stats, standings, player information, summaries, and more, providing a streamlined solution for staying updated.
name: Major League Baseball (MLB)
title: Major League Baseball (MLB)

api_list.name: MLB Schedule Team
MLB Team Roster
MLB Injuries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://major-league-baseball-mlb.p.rapidapi.com/injuries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "major-league-baseball-mlb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
